title: Batman (1989)
description: Gotham's dark knight battles the Joker in a visually iconic superhero tale directed by Tim Burton.

title: Safety Not Guaranteed
description: Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified ad seeking a companion for time travel.

title: The Fast and the Furious
description: An undercover cop infiltrates the world of underground street racing to investigate a series of hijackings.

title: Thunderheart
description: A part-Sioux FBI agent is sent to a Native American reservation to investigate a murder, only to confront his own identity.

title: Predestination
description: A time-traveling agent embarks on his final mission to stop an elusive terrorist known as the Fizzle Bomber.

title: Panic Room
description: A woman and her daughter are trapped in their home's panic room by burglars who are after a hidden fortune.

title: House of Flying Daggers
description: During the Tang Dynasty, two captains are sent to find a mysterious revolutionary faction called the House of Flying Daggers.

title: Alan Partridge: Alpha Papa
description: When a disgruntled DJ holds his workplace hostage, bumbling radio presenter Alan Partridge is thrust into the spotlight.

title: A Few Good Men
description: Military lawyer Lt. Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder, uncovering a high-level conspiracy.

title: The Tailor of Panama
description: A British spy recruits a tailor in Panama to gather intelligence, but the tailor's imagination spins out of control.
